isis.stitle: TSI 06-12-13 - Emission Calibration Conversion from Highway to Non-road (off-road)

subjectgroup.subject: Emission Calibration Conversion from Highway to Non-road (off-road)

geninfo.para: Non-road conversion eliminates engine performance problems caused by operating vehicles at low speeds and loads.
ECM calibration PKG2PN01 displaces PRG2PN01. Use PKG2PN01 for 2005 and 2006 Model Years
IDM calibration ANZ7BJ02 displaces ANZ7BJ01. Use ANZ7BJ02 for 2005 and 2006 Model Years

regulation.para: It is against the law to operate a vehicle on any public road or highway with an engine calibrated for non-road emissions.

item.para: The ECM calibration must be PKG2PN01.
The IDM calibration must be ANZ7BJ02.
Engines must be 175 horsepower or converted to 175 horsepower [Engine Family Rating Code (EFRC) 2111].
Enable Road Speed Limit must be programmed to 24 mph or less.

warning.para: To prevent personal injury or death, put transmission in neutral or park, set parking brake, and block wheels before doing diagnostic or service procedures on the engine or vehicle. Read all safety instructions in the "Safety Information" section of the Engine Service manual or the Engine Diagnosticmanual.

step1.para: Confirm engine calibration and horsepower rating.

item.para: Engine must be calibrated to PKG2PN01 and ANZ7BJ02.
Engine must be rated at 175 hp.
If calibrations and rating are met, continue with step 4.
If calibrations and rating are not met, continue with step 2.

step1.para: Use the EZ Tech® or NETS Program to retrieve and upload parameters for the ECM and vehicle.
Fax a Horsepower Request Form to the Vehicle Programming Center (1-260-461-1820).
After the horsepower quote is received, fax a signed Advice of Miscellaneous Charges Form to the Vehicle Programming Center (1-260-461-1820).
Remove the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) emission label from right valve cover.
Enable Road Speed Limit and program for 39 km (24 mph) or less.
Remove catalyst muffler and replace with muffler, Part No. 2587076C1.

step1.para: Request a non-road Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) emission label, part number 1872925C1 model year 2006 or 1853383C1 model year 2005, from the Reconfiguration Team. Send the following to the address below:

item.para: Legible copy of line set ticket with complete engine serial number
Dealer's address and name of person needing the new non-road EPA emission label.

step1.para: Put new non-road EPA emission label on right valve cover.

regulation.para: It is against the law to operate a vehicle on any public road or highway with an engine calibrated for non-road emissions.
